Articles.Content:
Some of you may have seen me on reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceprogram as /u/Silent_Sky. Others may have seen me on imgur as SilentSky42. Regardless, I'm here now. And I bring you all albums to date of my series of planetary abuse. I am punching the entire solar system. And I'm halfway done.

Mun

Minmus

Kerbin

Eeloo

Jool System

Dres

There's more to come. Possibly a livestream if I can get enough internet speed (screw you Verizon). And definitely a commentated youtube video of a special punch.

Sidenote: These albums have a lot of NSFW language. I don't censor myself, it's part of my style. You've been warned.

Poor Kerbin, got punched twice. Although I think Jool got the worst punishment, seeing all of its' moons being punched before it(plus Eeloo).

Although, why you were angry at Minmus? It's fairly easy to land there.
Hey, I saw this on reddit. Just have to say that your commentary makes everything 100x funnier. I laughed a lot when watching the Jool one.

This is beauti... I mean, oh the poor planets! What did they ever do to you!?...

(On the other hand, I am really looking forward to you punching Eve... That fat purple ***** has been giving me a lot of trouble as of late)
